fields.description:
When we change tintColor to white the cursor changes to white so when you focus a search bar, it doesn't show the cursor. We changed tintColor to white so that Cancel button shows as white but we don't want the cursor to be white.

Is it possible to have a different colors for cursor and cancel button?
fields.summary: iOS7: Support searchBar to have different cursor and cancel button color
